lol now beryl works and wow wont run any: are you using Xgl, or do you have an nVidia card?

unfortunately due to poor drivers with ATI cards you can't do multiple graphic composting. An easy solution is to log out, and select "gnome" from the session option on the log in screen, log back in and then play WoW. Of course you won't have your graphics while you are like this, but it *should* work depending on your configuration.
you can still use beryl, just not at the same time as WoW. Unless you wish to use nonXgl (google)
